component-description.author: Oliver Specht
component-description.name: math.SmModel
component-description.description: This component provides access to various settings of a formula.

component-description.author: xmloff development team
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.Math.XMLMetaImporter
component-description.description: This component imports the meta.xml stream into a math document.

component-description.author: xmloff development team
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.Math.XMLImporter
component-description.description: This component imports a single XML document stream into a math document.

component-description.author: xmloff development team
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.Math.XMLSettingsImporter
component-description.description: This component imports the settings.xml stream into a math document.

component-description.author: xmloff development team
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.Math.XMLMetaExporter
component-description.description: This component exports the meta of a math document.

component-description.author: xmloff development team
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.Math.XMLExporter
component-description.description: This component exports a math document into a single XML document stream.

component-description.author: xmloff development team
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.Math.XMLSettingsExporter
component-description.description: This component exports a the settings of a math document.

component-description.name: SmGraphicAccessible
component-description.description: The accessible view of a formula documents visual representation.
